game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve a powerful artifact from the Lost City of Eldarath, located on a remote island.
game.description: The ancient city is said to be filled with treasures and powerful relics. However, it's also rumored to be cursed, causing many adventurers who have attempted to retrieve the artifact to never return.

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the Lost City.
task.description: The entrance is hidden behind a waterfall. You'll need to navigate through the dense jungle to find it.

task.objective: Retrieve a map fragment from the ancient ruins.
task.description: The ruins are filled with traps and puzzles. You'll need to use your wits to navigate them and retrieve the map fragment.

task.objective: Face the guardian of the artifact and defeat it in combat.
task.description: The guardian is a powerful entity that protects the artifact. You'll need to use all your skills and abilities to defeat it.
